Queries.Query: select to_char( sysdate, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDateFrom from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-1, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-2, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-3, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-4, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-5, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-6, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-7, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual

select to_char( sysdate, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDateTo from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-1, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-2, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-3, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-4, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-5, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-6, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-7, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual
select 1 ParamShiftFrom from dual union all select 2 from dual
select 1 ParamShiftTo from dual union all select 2 from dual

select 'Количество записей за период '|| to_char(:ParamDateFrom,'dd.mm.yyyy')||' ' ||:ParamShiftFrom||' смены по '|| to_char(:ParamDateTo,'dd.mm.yyyy')||' '|| :ParamShiftTo||' смену для ' ||:ParamType||'' title from dual;

select 1 as KOL ,trunc(TIME) as SHIFTDATE ,COUNT('штук')
from EVENTSTATEARCHIVE where (:ParamType = 'Самосвалы') and (TIME between getpredefinedtimefrom('за указанную смену',:ParamShiftFrom,:ParamDateFrom) and getpredefinedtimeto('за указанную смену',:ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo))
group by trunc(TIME)
union all
select 1 as KOL ,trunc(TIME) as SHIFTDATE ,COUNT('штук')
from EVENTSTATEARCHIVE_HISTORY8 where (:ParamType = 'Самосвалы(последний архив)') and (TIME between getpredefinedtimefrom('за указанную смену',:ParamShiftFrom,:ParamDateFrom) and getpredefinedtimeto('за указанную смену',:ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo))
